title: CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF OPERATIONS - USD ($)shares in Thousands, $ in Thousands

null.label: Net sales
null.definition: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

null.label: Cost of goods sold
null.definition: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

null.label: Gross profit
null.definition: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

Operating expenses:.label: Selling, general and administrative
Operating expenses:.definition: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

Operating expenses:.label: Advertising and marketing
Operating expenses:.definition: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

Operating expenses:.label: Total operating expenses
Operating expenses:.definition: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

Operating expenses:.label: Income (loss) from operations
Operating expenses:.definition: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

Operating expenses:.label: Interest income (expense), net
Operating expenses:.definition: The net amount of nonoperating interest income (expense).

Operating expenses:.label: Other expense, net
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

Operating expenses:.label: Income (loss) before income tax provision
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

Operating expenses:.label: Income tax provision
Operating expenses:.definition: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

Operating expenses:.label: Net income (loss)
Operating expenses:.definition: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

Earnings (loss) per share attributable t.label: Basic (in dollars per share)
Earnings (loss) per share attributable t.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

Earnings (loss) per share attributable t.label: Diluted (in dollars per share)
Earnings (loss) per share attributable t.definition: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

Weighted-average common shares used in c.label: Basic (in shares)
Weighted-average common shares used in c.definition: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

Weighted-average common shares used in c.label: Diluted (in shares)
Weighted-average common shares used in c.definition: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.
